name: Tic Tac Toe
desc: A Tic Tac Toe game made using React and JavaScript. It uses Minimax algorithm, so the computer is unbeatable

name: iDesign
desc: An Augmented Design application made for Android and IOS. Made in Unity using C#. Made in a group for the paper Software Developement Practice.

name: ACDAP
desc: A Research and Development Project done as a university project at AUT. The client was the Digital and Transformation team at the Auckland council. The project required to develope a platform that gather various data from different Auckland council data sources.

name: SEER
desc: A searchable database of curated evidence for Software Engineering practices. Done for a university project. Was made using JavaScript, React and express. I worked on both the backend and frontend.
